description:
'''Jazz metal''' is the fusion of jazz fusion and jazz rock with [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]]. [[Animals as Leaders]]' albums ''[[The Joy of Motion]]'' (2014) and ''[[The Madness of Many]]'' (2016) have been described as progressive metal combined with jazz fusion. [[Panzerballett]] blends jazz with heavy metal. [[Imperial Triumphant]] combines jazz with [[death metal]] and [[black metal]].
{{clear}}
